## IChartUpdateOptions.updateDimsOnDraw property

On each draw should the viewport be adjusted to reflect the dimensions of the canvas? Where your application provides hooks for resize, this can be disabled for a minor performance win.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly updateDimsOnDraw: boolean;
```
